questions.question: What is the primary material visibly composing the majority of the product's structure?
Considering the overall form, what geometric descriptor best fits the product's shape?
Based on visual inspection, what is the apparent transparency level of the product?
What color is the primary visible packaging material of this product?
Describe the surface texture of the item, considering its apparent smoothness or roughness?
What is the apparent overall finish of the product, gloss or matte?
Judging from the image, what seems to be the function of the cardboard container?
What is the visible packaging material type that seems to protect the product?
Does the product appear to have any visible markings or printing on its surface?
Judging by the image, how many visible pieces constitute the complete package?
What is the dominant color observed in the product itself, excluding packaging?
What is the apparent thickness of the product, thin or thick?
Describe the visible shape of the product's interior packaging?
Considering the visual evidence, what is the apparent style of the product's design?
What is the visible state of the product, assembled or disassembled?
